name: Eternal Prey
description:
Get as many baby bunnies as you can, build them a playground, and hide from the predators! 

I recommend playing in full screen. Unfortunately, the WebGL build does have some bugs, like the border for the main menu is in the wrong spot. 

WASD. 'Space' to hide in a bush. When hiding, predators can't see you. Just move to get out of the bush. If you purchase a knife, then 'Space' will use the knife instead of the bush. 

Carrots double as lives, so try to always have some on you. 

When you die, you lose all your materials and buildings, but the baby bunnies you have accumulated will remain alive. 

If you want to get back to the main menu, like to see the 'Help' screen, just refresh the page :P 

----------------------------------------

This is my first (finished-ish) game and also my first game jam participation. This has been fun, and I will be doing it again.
